document_data.name: Drestin
document_data.mainbody: The '''Drestin''' was the seat of power for the [[Khaldomaun]], or ruler, of [[Yeshpek]] in the [[Lake of Steam]] region of [[south Faer√ªn]].<ref name=EotSS-p167">
document_data.Description: This large palace was constructed in a circular design and topped with an impressive dome. The central hall was decorated with a gigantic floating [[octopus]] preserved and animated with [[magic]]. The octopus was slain in Yeshpek's harbor long ago. Its movements were said to mimic the mood of the Khaldomaun whose throne was situated directly beneath it. The creature's beak stored several ''[[healing potion]]s'' and other magic.<ref name=EotSS-p167"/>
document_data.Activities: In addition to housing the Khaldomaun and his family, the Drestin housed all of Yeshpek's banks.<ref name=EotSS-p167"/>
